remarks: The sequence ` A ` converges to a positive real.  This proves that the Stirling's formula converges to the factorial, up to a constant.  In another theorem, using Wallis' formula for π& , such constant is exactly determined, thus proving the Stirling's formula.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
